name: WWII: The Great Crossing
description:
"It's a very awesome game it's like playing chess but better. The weapons are very useful. Immortality is a game in which you are a soldier who has to fulfill 23 missions but anyway it's still a great game so get it." iosappspy.com

"The graphics, sound effects, and gameplay are all really fun in this app and help to draw you in. You'll find yourself hooked pretty much from the get go and because it is so fast-paced there is this constant intensity that will have your heart racing." apppicker.com

DESCRIPTION

The Great Crossing is a game in which you are a soldier who has to fulfill 23 missions. You must free prisoners and eliminate the enemy. You can use a rifle, a grenade and a smokescreen to move imperceptibly. In the next missions you can get medals and money allowing you to complete your equipment.

Features:
- free the prisoners
- eliminate the enemies
- 23 different maps to explore
- 69 medals for you to achieve.
- game center integration

The game is fast-paced and fun for both casual and experienced gamers. The basics can be learned in a minute, but your tactics adapt to each new mission.
